item.title: 土耳其副总统誓言维持紧缩经济政策
item.description: 土耳其副总统切夫德特·伊尔马兹表示，尽管通胀出现放缓迹象，土耳其仍将坚持紧缩的经济政策立场，驳斥了通胀回落将促使政策放松的预期。【原文：Turkey will stick with a tight economic policy stance despite signs of easing inflation, Vice President Cevdet Yilmaz said, pushing back against expectations that disinflation will prompt a loosening of policy.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称莫迪未致电特朗普致贸易协议告吹
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克表示，去年与印度的贸易协议未能达成，是因为总理纳伦德拉·莫迪没有致电唐纳德·特朗普总统。【原文：US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said a trade deal with India did not materialize last year because Prime Minister Narendra Modi did not call President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 富时100指数有望在矿业巨额交易谈判中上涨
沙特对亚洲石油销售在第三次降价后仍将保持强劲
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯对东亚的原油销售量预计将持续高于正常水平，此前全球最大原油出口国因市场出现供应过剩迹象而连续第三个月下调油价。【原文：Crude oil sales from Saudi Arabia to East Asia are set to persist above usual levels after the world’s biggest exporter cut prices for a third month on signs of oversupply in the market.】

item.title: 英伟达首选芯片制造商台积电营收超预期
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司营收超出预期，尽管业界担忧存在泡沫风险，但这仍强化了全球人工智能领域在2026年持续投入的希望。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s revenue topped estimates, reinforcing hopes of sustained global AI spending in 2026 despite concerns about an industry bubble.】

item.title: 特朗普与中国对抗的戏码上演于希腊一个沉寂的港口
item.description:
美国不喜欢北京拥有该国最大的港口，因此正试图制定替代方案。【原文：

The US doesn’t like Beijing’s ownership of the country’s biggest port, so it’s trying to come up with an alternative plan.

】

item.title: 非洲独角兽Flutterwave押注Mono收购案以强化IPO前景
item.description: Flutterwave公司首席执行官表示，收购开放银行平台Mono Technologies Nigeria Ltd.将提升公司盈利能力，并为非洲最有价值的金融科技独角兽企业潜在的首次公开募股（IPO）奠定更坚实基础。【原文：Flutterwave Inc. is betting its purchase of open-banking platform Mono Technologies Nigeria Ltd. will boost earnings and strengthen the case for a potential initial public offering by Africa’s most valuable financial-technology unicorn, its chief executive said.】

item.title: 澳大利亚储能公司Akaysha据称考虑出售股权
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着能源存储需求增长，澳大利亚Akaysha Energy公司正考虑多种融资方案，包括出售大量少数股权。【原文：Australia’s Akaysha Energy Pty is considering options to raise more funds, including selling a significant minority stake, as demand for energy storage grows, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲股票交易员指南：最高法院关税裁决迫在眉睫
item.description: 亚洲股市在经历了去年特朗普全面加征关税带来的震荡后，如今又面临新的转折点——美国最高法院最早可能于周五就关税合法性作出裁决。【原文：Asian stock markets, having weathered turbulence from Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs last year, face another inflection point as the US Supreme Court prepares to rule possibly as early as Friday on their validity.】

item.title: 加纳计划首次发行9.35亿美元国内基础设施债券
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，加纳计划通过首次发行国内基础设施债券筹集100亿塞地（约合9.35亿美元），用于该西非国家的道路和立交桥建设。【原文：Ghana is planning to raise 10 billion cedis ($935 million) in its first domestic infrastructure bond issuance to fund roads and interchanges in the West African nation, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩国将于七月启动24小时外汇交易以确保升级
item.description: 韩国将于7月推出24小时外汇交易，并于9月放宽离岸交易规则，这是该国为争取MSCI公司承认其发达市场地位而持续多年努力的最新举措。【原文：South Korea will introduce 24-hour currency exchange trading in July and relax rules for offshore transactions by September, the latest step in its years-long effort to secure developed-market status from MSCI Inc.】

item.title: 叫我危机夫人：拉加德在欧洲危机最后关头挺身而出
item.description: 自称欧洲"危机夫人"的这位女性，正步入职业生涯的最后阶段，而眼下的世界已与她曾经所知的面目大相径庭。【原文：The woman who calls herself Europe’s “Mrs. Crisis” is approaching the final stretch of her career with the world barely recognizable from the one she once knew.】

item.title: 英国企业裁员潮加剧，推动英国央行降息压力
item.description: 英国面临失业的工人数量已达到近三年来最高水平，预算案公布后劳动力市场持续恶化，这很可能引发英国央行警铃大作。【原文：More British workers face losing their job than at any point in almost three years, a post-budget deterioration in the labor market that is likely to set off alarm bells at the Bank of England.】

item.title: 韩国释放经济增长改善信号，正推动外汇市场开放
item.description: 韩国政府对经济前景的看法比央行更为乐观，在当局进一步向全球投资者开放本国货币和金融市场的举措中，其表态也更显积极。【原文：South Korea’s government is a little more optimistic about the economy’s prospects than the central bank, striking a more upbeat tone as authorities move to further open the nation’s currency and financial markets to global investors.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴股价上涨，因中国计划批准进口H200
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司股价大涨，市场乐观预期这家科技巨头将受益于英伟达公司H200芯片在中国市场的供应。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. shares jumped on optimism that the tech giant can benefit if Nvidia Corp.’s H200 chips are made available in China.】

item.title: LG能源第四季度意外亏损，电动汽车需求放缓
item.description: LG能源解决方案公司第四季度意外出现初步运营亏损，电动汽车需求放缓（包括部分市场补贴政策回撤）令这家韩国最大电池制造商的前景蒙上阴影。【原文：LG Energy Solution Ltd. reported a surprise preliminary operating loss for the fourth-quarter as slowing demand for electric vehicles, including the rollback of subsidies in some markets, darkens the outlook for South Korea’s largest battery maker.】

item.title: 美国开发商格伦法恩启动得克萨斯州液化天然气项目融资
item.description: 美国私营开发商格伦法恩集团表示，其正在为在得克萨斯州规划的液化天然气出口项目筹措资金。【原文：Privately-held US developer Glenfarne Group LLC said it’s in the process of financing its planned liquefied natural gas export project in Texas.】

item.title: 日本保险公司Sompo将加大海外信贷投资力度
item.description: 日本第三大财产险公司Sompo Holdings Inc.正计划加大对高收益海外信贷的投资力度以提升利润，因其传统业务陷入困境。【原文：Sompo Holdings Inc. is aiming to increase investments in higher-yielding overseas credit to boost profits as traditional business flounders at Japan’s third-biggest property and casualty insurer.】

item.title: TCS与印孚瑟斯将揭示2026年需求趋势，市场预期持续上调
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务公司和印孚瑟斯公司将透露客户2026年预算的制定情况，该行业正迎来又一个业绩平淡的财报季。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. and Infosys Ltd. will give clues on how clients’ 2026 budgets are shaping up as the sector heads into another muted earnings season.】

item.title: 中国工业买家避开铜价创纪录高位
item.description: 在铜价飙升至历史高位后，中国铜需求的大部分已基本消失。【原文：A significant chunk of Chinese copper demand has all but evaporated after the metal’s stunning surge to record levels.】

item.title: 英伟达聘请谷歌云高管担任市场营销主管
item.description: 英伟达公司任命谷歌云高管艾莉森·瓦贡菲尔德为首席营销官，此举表明这家硅谷芯片制造商正寻求进一步提升其行业影响力。【原文：Nvidia Corp. tapped Google Cloud executive Alison Wagonfeld as chief marketing officer, a sign the Silicon Valley chipmaker is looking to further raise its profile.】

item.title: 礼来支持的Aktis Oncology在美国IPO募资3.177亿美元
item.description: Aktis Oncology公司是一家临床阶段生物技术企业，其支持者包括礼来公司。该公司以定价区间上限完成首次公开募股，筹集资金达3.177亿美元。【原文：Aktis Oncology Inc., a clinical-stage biotechnology company that counts Eli Lilly & Co. among its backers, raised $317.7 million in an initial public offering priced at the top of the marketed range.】

item.title: 日本呼吁与中国保持稀土、食品等商品的顺畅贸易
item.description: 随着亚洲两大经济体之间的争端升级，日本呼吁确保食品和稀土的顺利运输，此前有报道称北京方面正阻碍这些商品的贸易。【原文：Japan called for smooth shipments of food and rare earths following reports that Beijing is hindering trade on those goods as the dispute between Asia’s two largest economies escalates.】

item.title: 贝森特通过金融服务调查加强明尼苏达州审查力度
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特周四接受福克斯新闻采访时表示，财政部正准备宣布对明尼苏达州的货币服务企业展开严厉打击，此举是针对该州欺诈及涉嫌洗钱行为的持续调查的一部分。【原文：The US Treasury is preparing to announce a crackdown on money services businesses in Minnesota as part of an ongoing probe into fraud and alleged money laundering in the state, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said in an interview with Fox News on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国通胀率触及34个月高点，食品价格反弹是主要推手
item.description: 中国上月通胀加速至近三年最高水平，这波上涨主要由食品价格上涨推动，掩盖了更深层的通缩压力。【原文：China’s inflation accelerated last month at the fastest pace in nearly three years, in an upswing largely driven by higher food costs that are masking deeper deflationary pressure.】

item.title: 韩国法院就尹锡悦军事管制案举行最终听证
item.description: 首尔一家法院就前总统尹锡悦2024年错误宣布戒严令一案展开最终庭审，检方将对这位遭弹劾的领导人寻求死刑或无期徒刑判决。【原文：A Seoul court began a final hearing for former President Yoon Suk Yeol over his botched declaration of martial law in 2024, with prosecutors set to seek either the death penalty or a life sentence for the impeached leader.】

item.title: 和发农业通过越南首次公开募股筹集4800万美元
item.description: 和发农业发展股份公司在首次公开募股中筹集了约1.257万亿越南盾（4800万美元），因认购申请远超发行规模。【原文：Hoa Phat Agriculture Development JSC raised about 1.257 trillion dong ($48 million) in its initial public offering after receiving more bids than shares it offered.】

item.title: 蓝星钢铁最大股东支持拒绝88亿美元收购要约
item.description: 蓝星钢铁有限公司最大股东澳大利亚超级基金支持该公司拒绝钢铁动力公司与澳大利亚综合企业SGH有限公司提出的132亿澳元（88亿美元）收购要约，称该要约低估了企业价值。【原文：BlueScope Steel Ltd.’s largest shareholder, AustralianSuper, backed the company’s rejection of a A$13.2 billion ($8.8 billion) takeover approach from Steel Dynamics Inc. and Australian conglomerate SGH Ltd., saying it undervalued the business.】

item.title: 国泰航空寻求节省开支，在提高效率的推动下裁减部分岗位
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着香港旗舰航空公司国泰航空有限公司今年准备放缓增长步伐，该公司已要求所有部门寻找节省开支和提高效率的途径，以控制支出。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. has asked all departments to identify savings and efficiencies in an attempt to rein in expenses, as Hong Kong’s flagship carrier prepares for a slower rate of growth this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 狂热玩家的财富将因MiniMax AI上市飙升至16亿美元
item.description: 中国初创企业MiniMax集团在生成式人工智能热潮中度过了最初三年，基本处于旁观状态。当竞争对手争相开发本土版ChatGPT克隆产品时，这家上海团队却致力于攻克更艰巨的课题：构建一个能同时处理文本、语音和视频的单一模型。【原文：Chinese startup MiniMax Group Ltd. spent its first three years largely on the sidelines of the generative-AI boom. As rivals chased local ChatGPT clones, the Shanghai-based team tackled a harder problem: building a single model capable of processing text, speech and video.】
